languages.text: {n}Вам значительно проще прекратить осмыслять К'тан, чем Ему, постигающему мир многими сотнями способов, осмыслять вас.{/n}
{n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам значительно проще прекратить осмыслять К'тан, чем Ему, постигающему мир многими сотнями способов, осмыслять вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend C'Tan than for Him, who can comprehend the world in hundreds of ways, to stop trying to comprehend you.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Il est bien plus simple pour vous de ne plus chercher à comprendre le C'tan que pour lui, qui peut appréhender le monde de centaines de façons, de ne plus vous comprendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il est bien plus simple pour vous de ne plus chercher à comprendre le C'tan que pour lui, qui peut appréhender le monde de centaines de façons, de ne plus chercher à vous comprendre.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}A ti te resulta mucho más fácil dejar de intentar comprender al C'tan que a Él, que puede comprender el mundo de cientos de formas, dejar de comprenderte a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A ti te resulta mucho más fácil dejar de intentar comprender al C'Tan que a Él, que puede comprender el mundo de cientos de formas, dejar de intentar comprenderte a ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}让你去停止理解星神的存在，比让星神停止理解你的存在要容易得多。因为对星神而言，祂可以通过数百种不同的方式来理解这个世界。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}让你去停止理解星神的存在，比让星神停止理解你的存在要容易得多。因为对星神而言，祂可以通过数百种不同的方式来理解这个世界。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Es fällt dir viel leichter, den C'tan nicht länger zu verstehen zu versuchen, als es ihm — der die Welt auf hunderte von Arten verstehen kann — fällt, dich nicht länger zu verstehen zu versuchen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es fällt dir viel leichter, den C'tan nicht länger zu verstehen zu versuchen, als es ihm — der die Welt auf hunderte von Arten verstehen kann — fällt, dich nicht länger zu verstehen zu versuchen.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}何百通りもの世界を理解することができるク＝タンがあなたを理解しようとするのを止めるより、あなたがク＝タンの理解を諦める方がずっと簡単だろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何百通りもの世界を理解することができるク＝タンがあなたを理解しようとするのを止めるより、あなたがク＝タンの理解を諦める方がずっと簡単だろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Senin C'tan'ı idrak etmeye çalışmayı kesmen, dünyayı yüzlerce şekilde kavrayabilen O'nun seni idrak etmeyi kesmesinden çok daha kolay.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is much easier for you to stop trying to comprehend the C'tan than for It, one who can grasp the world in hundreds of ways, to stop comprehending you.{/n}
